tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InventoryTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    product_id INT,
    quantity_change INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE InventoryTransactions (
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE InventoryAuditTrail (
    audit_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    action_taken VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    audit_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES InventoryTransactions(transaction_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StockAdditions ( 
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  product_id INT, 
  quantity_added INT, 
  added_by_user VARCHAR(50), 
  added_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE StockTransfers ( 
  transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  product_id INT, 
  quantity_transferred INT, 
  source_location VARCHAR(50), 
  destination_location VARCHAR(50), 
  transfer_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE StockAdjustments ( 
  adjustment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  product_id INT, 
  quantity_adjusted INT, 
  reason VARCHAR(100), 
  adjusted_by_user VARCHAR(50), 
  adjustment_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE transfers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    from_location VARCHAR(255),
    to_location VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE adjustments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    reason VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_transactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(255),
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE StockTransactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE StockAdditions (
    addition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity_added INTEGER NOT NULL,
    added_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    added_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE StockTransfers (
    transfer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    from_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    to_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity_transferred INTEGER NOT NULL,
    transfer_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE StockAdjustments (
    adjustment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id UUID NOT NULL,
    quantity_adjusted INTEGER NOT NULL,
    reason TEXT,
    adjusted_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE StockProducts (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity_on_hand INTEGER NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
